Imagery Description: (a) Standing Dionysos, with drapery over l. arm, fillet in r. hand, thyrsus in l., (A) standing draped woman, wrapped in cloak, with 'skewer of fruit' in r. hand, stick in l.
Additional Notes: Cf. with the Painter of Wurzburg H 5739 for the wavy lines across the woman's drapery.
